scripts.man_build: rimraf ./dist/ && tsc && cp manifest.json dist/manifest.json && cp inject.js dist/inject.js && cp popup.js dist/popup.js && cp popup.html dist/popup.html && node fix_imports.js
scripts.build: rimraf ./dist/ && npx webpack --config webpack.config.js && cp manifest.json dist/manifest.json && cp inject.js dist/inject.js && cp popup.js dist/popup.js && cp popup.html dist/popup.html
